Dataset_Name: Census Bureau Urbanized Area or Urbanized Cluster
Processing: Clip to Bay Area 2019 Census Tiger County boundaries

Notes: S = Farmland similar to Prime Farmland but with minor shortcomings, such as greater slopes or less ability to store soil moisture. Land must have been used for irrigated agricultural production at some time during the four years prior to the mapping date.
